title: Easy Chicken Fried Rice

steps.instruction: Prep the chicken: Cut the chicken thighs into small, bite-sized pieces.
Prepare the eggs: Crack the four large eggs into a small bowl and beat them together with a fork.
Chop the green onion: Finely chop about a quarter cup of green onion.
Heat the oil: Place a large, preferably non-stick pan or wok over medium-high heat and add one tablespoon of oil.
Cook the chicken: Add the seasoned chicken to the pan and cook for about four to five minutes, stirring occasionally or just until the chicken is fully cooked through.
Transfer to bowl: Transfer the cooked chicken to a separate bowl.
Scramble eggs: Add the scrambled eggs to the same bowl with the chicken.
Cook rice: Add five cups of cooked and cooled rice to the pan.
Saut√© rice: Spread the rice in an even layer over the bottom of the pan and let that sit undisturbed without stirring for one to two minutes.
Stir and saute: Give the rice a stir, then saute for another one to two minutes undisturbed. The rice should sizzle.
Drizzle soy sauce: Drizzle the top with two tablespoons of soy sauce or add it to taste.
Add peas and carrots: Add the five cups of peas and carrots.
Combine: Stir in 12 ounces of thawed peas and carrots.
Add chicken and eggs: Add the chicken and scrambled eggs back to the pan and stir everything to combine, breaking up the eggs into smaller pieces.
Add green onion: Stir in 12 ounces of chopped green onion.
Cook: Continue stirring and cooking just until everything is heated through. You can also add more soy sauce and sesame oil to taste.

source_title: Chicken Fried Rice - EASY DINNER under 30 Minutes
